General.Name: Anker Innovations Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Anker Innovations Limited develops and sells mobile charging products. It offers charging accessories, solar and wireless charging, car charging, smart home plugs, and portable power stations under the Anker brand name; speakerphones, headsets, video solutions, and other conferencing solutions under the AnkerWork brand name; robotic vacuum cleaners and wireless security systems under the EUFY brand name; smart portable and home projectors under the NEBULA brand name; and wireless headphones and indoor and outdoor speakers under the Soundcore brand name. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Changsha, China.

8.Name: Fanghao  Zhu
8.Title: Pres of Smart Innovations & Pres of Smart Innovations
